when_to_say: When referring to a fruit or food.
example: Ich esse einen Apfel. (I eat an apple.)

when_to_say: When referring to a drink or hydration.
example: Ich trinke Wasser. (I drink water.)

when_to_say: When talking about food, especially breakfast or meals.
example: Ich esse Brot zum Frühstück. (I eat bread for breakfast.)

when_to_say: When referring to dairy products or drinks.
example: Ich mag Milch. (I like milk.)

when_to_say: When referring to dessert or a cold treat.
example: Ich liebe Eis. (I love ice cream.)

when_to_say: When referring to vegetables or cooking ingredients.
example: Ich kaufe Tomaten. (I buy tomatoes.)

when_to_say: When referring to fruit or snacks.
example: Ich esse eine Banane. (I eat a banana.)

when_to_say: When ordering or referring to a beverage.
example: Ich trinke jeden Morgen Kaffee. (I drink coffee every morning.)

when_to_say: When referring to sweeteners in food or drink.
example: Bitte Zucker für meinen Kaffee. (Please, sugar for my coffee.)

when_to_say: When referring to seafood.
example: Ich esse Fisch zum Abendessen. (I eat fish for dinner.)

when_to_say: When referring to food or meal preferences.
example: Ich esse kein Fleisch. (I don’t eat meat.)

when_to_say: When referring to poultry or meals.
example: Das Hühnchen ist lecker. (The chicken is delicious.)

when_to_say: When referring to vegetables or meals.
example: Die Kartoffel ist gekocht. (The potato is cooked.)

when_to_say: When referring to food or meals.
example: Reis ist gesund. (Rice is healthy.)

when_to_say: When cooking or preparing meals.
example: Butter auf das Brot. (Butter on the bread.)

when_to_say: When referring to drinks.
example: Ich trinke Apfelsaft. (I drink apple juice.)

when_to_say: When referring to sweets or desserts.
example: Ich mag Schokolade. (I like chocolate.)

when_to_say: When referring to dairy or food.
example: Käse ist lecker. (Cheese is delicious.)

when_to_say: When talking about fruits or desserts.
example: Die Erdbeeren sind süß. (The strawberries are sweet.)

when_to_say: When seasoning food or cooking.
example: Vergiss das Salz nicht! (Don't forget the salt!)
